Based on your request for a "todo app", I'm going to create a market-leading productivity tool that includes:
- Core requested features: Add, edit, delete, and mark todos as complete/incomplete
- Industry standard additions: Due dates, priority levels, filtering, sorting, persistent storage, responsive design
- High-value enhancements: Bulk actions, color-coded priorities, search, loading states, and confirmation dialogs

Design decisions for this project:
- Color scheme: Neutral base (gray/white) with accent blue for productivity, green for completed, red/yellow for priority
- Layout approach: Dashboard-style with sidebar navigation, main todo list area, modal for adding/editing todos
- Authentication: Not needed for a simple personal todo app (can be added later if multi-user features are requested)
- Key features: Enhanced todo management, intuitive UI, mobile-friendly, persistent state with Zustand

Here's the industry standards and feature enhancement plan for a modern todo app, based on the search results and market leaders like Todoist:

**Core Features:**
- Add, edit, delete todos
- Mark todos as complete/incomplete
- Persistent storage

**Industry Standard Features:**
- Due dates and reminders
- Priority levels (color-coded)
- Filtering and sorting (by date, priority, status)
- Search functionality
- Bulk actions (mark all complete, delete selected)
- Responsive design (mobile-friendly)
- Empty state design (friendly message when no todos)
- Loading states and error handling

**Premium/High-Value Additions:**
- Calendar view (UI preview, not full implementation)
- Recurring tasks (UI preview, not full implementation)
- Drag-and-drop reordering (UI preview)
- Gamification elements (progress bar, streaks)
- Floating action button for quick add
- Swipe actions (mobile UI preview)

- Floating action button for adding todos
- Modal dialog for add/edit
- Color-coded priority badges
- Progress bar for completed tasks
- Friendly empty state illustration/message
- Smooth transitions and micro-interactions

from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException, Query
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from typing import List, Optional
from db_config import get_db
from database.todo import Todo
from models.todo_models import TodoCreate, TodoRead, TodoUpdate
import datetime

router = APIRouter(prefix="/todos", tags=["todos"])

# Create a todo
@router.post("/", response_model=TodoRead)
def create_todo(todo: TodoCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    print("Creating todo:", todo.title)
    db_todo = Todo(
        title=todo.title,
        description=todo.description,
        completed=False,
        due_date=todo.due_date,
        priority=todo.priority,
    )
    db.add(db_todo)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_todo)
    return db_todo

# Get all todos with optional filters
@router.get("/", response_model=List[TodoRead])
def get_todos(
    db: Session = Depends(get_db),
    completed: Optional[bool] = Query(None),
    priority: Optional[str] = Query(None),
    search: Optional[str] = Query(None),
    due_before: Optional[datetime.datetime] = Query(None),
):
    print("Fetching todos with filters:", completed, priority, search, due_before)
    query = db.query(Todo)
    if completed is not None:
        query = query.filter(Todo.completed == completed)
    if priority is not None:
        query = query.filter(Todo.priority == priority)
    if search:
        query = query.filter(Todo.title.ilike(f"%{search}%"))
    if due_before:
        query = query.filter(Todo.due_date <= due_before)
    todos = query.order_by(Todo.due_date.asc().nulls_last(), Todo.priority.desc()).all()
    return todos

# Get a single todo by ID

def get_todo(todo_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    print("Fetching todo:", todo_id)
    todo = db.query(Todo).filter(Todo.id == todo_id).first()
    if not todo:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Todo not found")
    return todo

# Update a todo
@router.put("/{todo_id}/", response_model=TodoRead)
def update_todo(todo_id: int, todo_update: TodoUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    print("Updating todo:", todo_id)
    todo = db.query(Todo).filter(Todo.id == todo_id).first()
    if not todo:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Todo not found")
    for field, value in todo_update.model_dump(exclude_unset=True).items():
        setattr(todo, field, value)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(todo)
    return todo

def delete_todo(todo_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    print("Deleting todo:", todo_id)
    todo = db.query(Todo).filter(Todo.id == todo_id).first()
    if not todo:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Todo not found")
    db.delete(todo)
    db.commit()
    return {"detail": "Todo deleted"}

import {
  Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, ModalCloseButton,
  Button, FormControl, FormLabel, Input, Textarea, Select, useToast
} from '@chakra-ui/react'
import { useState } from 'react'
import { useTodoStore } from '../stores/todo-store'

interface TodoFormProps {
  isOpen: boolean
  onClose: () => void
  initialValues?: {
    title?: string
    description?: string
    due_date?: string
    priority?: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'
  }
}

const defaultValues = {
  title: '',
  description: '',
  due_date: '',
  priority: 'low' as 'low' | 'medium' | 'high',
}

const TodoForm = ({ isOpen, onClose, initialValues }: TodoFormProps) => {
  const [form, setForm] = useState(initialValues || defaultValues)
  const [submitting, setSubmitting] = useState(false)
  const { addTodo } = useTodoStore()
  const toast = useToast()

  const handleChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement | HTMLSelectElement>) => {
    setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })
  }

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    setSubmitting(true)
    try {
      await addTodo({
        title: form.title,
        description: form.description,
        due_date: form.due_date ? new Date(form.due_date).toISOString() : undefined,
        priority: form.priority,
      })
      toast({ title: 'Todo added!', status: 'success' })
      setForm(defaultValues)
      onClose()
    } catch {
      toast({ title: 'Failed to add todo', status: 'error' })
    } finally {
      setSubmitting(false)
    }
  }

  return (
    <Modal isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose} isCentered>
      <ModalOverlay />
      <ModalContent>
        <ModalHeader>Add Todo</ModalHeader>
        <ModalCloseButton />
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
          <ModalBody>
            <FormControl isRequired mb={3}>
              <FormLabel>Title</FormLabel>
              <Input name="title" value={form.title} onChange={handleChange} maxLength={100} />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl mb={3}>
              <FormLabel>Description</FormLabel>
              <Textarea name="description" value={form.description} onChange={handleChange} maxLength={500} />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl mb={3}>
              <FormLabel>Due Date</FormLabel>
              <Input type="date" name="due_date" value={form.due_date} onChange={handleChange} />
            </FormControl>
            <FormControl mb={3}>
              <FormLabel>Priority</FormLabel>
              <Select name="priority" value={form.priority} onChange={handleChange}>
                <option value="low">Low</option>
                <option value="medium">Medium</option>
                <option value="high">High</option>
              </Select>
            </FormControl>
          </ModalBody>
          <ModalFooter>
            <Button onClick={onClose} mr={3} variant="ghost">
              Cancel
            </Button>
            <Button colorScheme="brand" type="submit" isLoading={submitting}>
              Add Todo
            </Button>
          </ModalFooter>
        </form>
      </ModalContent>
    </Modal>
  )
}
